entry.title: 2 years after, I finally launched my website

link.title: 2 years after, I finally launched my website

entry.content: Well. Finally after 2 years of thinking about it, I launched a personal website. Neat thing about it - powered by Jekyll and I can use Markdown to author my posts. It actually is a lot easier than I thought it was going to be.
entry.summary: Well. Finally after 2 years of thinking about it, I launched a personal website. Neat thing about it - powered by Jekyll and I can use Markdown to author my posts. It actually is a lot easier than I thought it was going to be.
